stories.text:
Sri Lanka is facing one of the worst economic crisis right now. The value of local currency against dollar is depreciating every day. The only way out of this is to bring in more dollars. I have no clue how effective it would be though. I would like to know if you were to hire from Sri Lanka, what is your considerations be? are there any factors limiting that decision?

We need outside help now. More remote jobs from abroad can help us bring more dollars into the country. If you can hire more Sri Lankans for open positions in your company, please do it. And also share what do you think below. Thank you.
stories.title: Ask HN: What is your take on hiring from Sri Lanka?
